name: Condemned to Explode
description:
Description

Condemned to Explode is a singleplayer survival sandbox with a story and lore component.

The Vorhzstakan government has chosen you for a special job collecting ores underground. The work may be difficult, and the quotas may be steep, but the payoff is... well, you don't want to be re-educated now do you? Fight spiders, create tools, and battle the clock in a race to complete ever-increasing quotas in Condemned to Explode. Or else we can re-educate you. Your choice.

To a prosperous and successful Vorhzstaka!

Estimated playtime, 2 - 3 hrs.
